questions.quote: 'Maybe you know some little places to go, where they never close...'
Well, I mean, he was in the apartment, and then it's gone and it's in your apartment.
Can you believe someone would lie about chemotherapy to get a wig? Would you do that?
You're just like George. George'd do the same thing. You're just like him. It's amazing!
Well, here's my shower routine. Maybe I can make some changes. Get wash cloth mittens and maybe some liquid soap, and just... -pop- focus!
Really? You never slipped one past the goalie in all these years??... Boy, I'm surprised. You've slept with a lot of women!
Yeah, a decent hotel-room, would it be terribly inconvenient if she stayed at my place.
So what?! She is talking about my shoes! She is discussing my shoes! It is nobody's business where I buy my shoes!
You start flirting with him and I'll come by and, while you're keeping him busy, I'll slip it in his drink.
Oh, thank you, Sid, but that's all in the past. I'm ready to move on.
